data.title: Compound Return
data.statement:
You are holding a position in a great stock for the last [[n]] years. Each year, the stock grows at a different percentage [[rate]] (compounded annually). You started with an initial investment of [[p]]. Your task is to calculate the total value of your investment at the end of [[n]] years.

Additionally, you want to calculate the total return earned over [[n]] years.
data.stubGenerator:
read p:int
read n:int
loop n read rate:int
write <total_value> <total_return>
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[p]] for your initial investment.
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[n]] for the number of years passed.
<<Next [[n]] lines:>> The percentage [[rate]] of return for each year.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> Two space-separated integers, [[total_value]] [[total_return]] for the current value of your investment, and the gained return both rounded down to whole number.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are holding a position in a great stock for the last n years. Each year, the stock grows at a different percentage rate (compounded annually). You started with an initial investment of p. Your task is to calculate the total value of your investment at the end of n years.

Additionally, you want to calculate the total return earned over n years.
Input
Line 1: An integer p for your initial investment.
Line 2: An integer n for the number of years passed.
Next n lines: The percentage rate of return for each year.
Output
Line 1 : Two space-separated integers, total_value total_return for the current value of your investment, and the gained return both rounded down to whole number.
Constraints
1 <= p <= 10^6
1 <= n <= 10
-99 <= rate <= 100
Example
Input
100
2
10
10
Output
121 21
